coreQueryPageProvider.name: cad_composition_document_suggestion
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM CadAssembly,CadPart,CadDesignTable WHERE ecm:fulltext LIKE '?*' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:isProxy = 0
